notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: Nascent RNA next-generation sequencing has been submitted to the Gene Expression Omnibus (accession number GSE160792). Total RNA-Seq, ChIP-Seq, and DNase-Seq samples were previously deposited in the Gene Expression Omnibus (accession numbers GSE54478 and GSE29222). Publicly available high-throughput datasets used in the study are described in Supplementary Data 1. All other relevant data supporting the key findings of this study are available within the article, supplementary information or from the corresponding authors upon request. Source data are provided with this paper.
